Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems.

At this time, consider other service alternatives to service your trip such as other buses or buses to other rail lines. 

This may include: 
.
#56 Milwaukee
#81W West Lawrence 
#81 Lawrence 
#88 Higgins
#90 Harlem 
#92 Foster 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays, Boarding Change at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
